title: skeletonMeta
description: Static metadata describing the anatomical or virtual skeleton of a tracked body or model, including all bones, joints, and their hierarchical relationships.

name.description: Canonical name or identifier of the skeleton (e.g., 'HumanBody', 'LeftHand', 'XRHand').

region.description: Overall anatomical region represented by this skeleton (e.g., 'hand', 'body').

side.description: Optional anatomical side represented by this skeleton: 'left', 'right', or 'centre'.

rootJoint.description: The root joint of the skeleton hierarchy.

joints.description: List of all joint metadata objects composing the skeleton.

bones.description: List of all bone metadata objects connecting the joints.

chains.description: Optional ordered chains of joints defining specific kinematic paths (e.g., fingers, spine).

metadata.description: Optional additional metadata, such as tracking source, calibration parameters, device model, or versioning.

source.description: Name or identifier of the device or tracking system that defined this skeleton (e.g., 'OpenXR', 'OptiTrack').

version.description: Version string identifying the rig or calibration used.

extensions.description: Custom extension fields for future compatibility.
